HomePage.hero: CAN ALBUM COVERS BE USED TO MAKE MUSIC RECOMMENDATIONS

TermsPage.title: Find out if album covers can be used to make music recommendations better for you!
TermsPage.description: Please review and accept our terms to participate in this exciting research!

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.content: This website supports research into music recommendation systems, aiming to improve user experiences and algorithmic accuracy.

userAgreement.title: User Agreement
userAgreement.content: By using this website, you agree to participate in our research study and comply with these terms and conditions.

privacyData.title: Privacy & Data
privacyData.content: We collect limited data for research purposes. Your information is kept secure and confidential, and will not be shared with third parties.

voluntary.title: Voluntary Participation
voluntary.content: Your participation is entirely voluntary. You can withdraw from the study at any time without any negative consequences.

risksBenefits.title: Risks & Benefits
risksBenefits.content: There is low risk associated with this study. Benefits include contributing to the advancement of music recommendation technology.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions or concerns, please contact me at nb302289@falmouth.ac.uk .

guide.title: Guide to Using the Music Recommendation Survey
guide.intro: This guide will walk you through how to navigate and use the music recommendation survey effectively.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.access: Accessing the Survey: Navigate to the survey landing page where you'll be introduced to the study purpose.
gettingStarted.structure: Survey Structure: The survey consists of multiple steps evaluating different music recommendation models:

features.seedSong: Seed Song: At the top of the page, you'll see the seed song that recommendations are based on.
features.swipeRight: Swipe right (or click the right arrow) to save a song to your playlist
features.swipeLeft: Swipe left (or click the left arrow) to skip a song
features.vibration: Mobile users will feel a slight vibration when liking a song
features.undo: Undo Function: Made a mistake? Use the Undo button to revert your last swipe.
features.progress: Progress Tracking: The progress bar shows how many songs you've rated and how many remain.
features.completion: Rating completion: After rating all songs, you'll be presented with model rating questions.

stepByStep.title: Step by Step
stepByStep.reviewSeed: Review the seed song at the top of the screen to understand what the recommendations are based on.
stepByStep.listenPreview: Listen to a preview if available by clicking the play button
stepByStep.evaluate: Evaluate if you would add this song to your playlist
stepByStep.swipeAction: Swipe right if you like it, left if you don't
stepByStep.afterReview: After reviewing all songs in a playlist:
stepByStep.rateModel: Rate the recommendation model on relevance, novelty, and satisfaction
stepByStep.submit: Submit your ratings to proceed to the next playlist
stepByStep.repeat: Repeat for all 9 playlists across the 3 different recommendation models

completion.title: Complete the final survey with questions about:
completion.feedback: Feedback on the survey usability and clarity

tips.title: Tips
tips.listen: Listen to each song before making your decision
tips.undo: Use the undo button if you accidentally swipe the wrong way
tips.takeTime: Take your time - there's no rush to complete the ratings
tips.completeSteps: Complete all steps to ensure your feedback is properly recorded
tips.consistent: Be consistent with your preferences to get the most accurate model evaluation

technical.title: Technical Notes
technical.progress: Your survey progress is automatically saved in your browser
technical.pause: You can pause and resume the survey later from the same device
technical.submitted: Once submitted, your ratings help evaluate different music recommendation algorithms
technical.results: Results will be available in the Results tab after April 1st

guide.thanks: Thank you for participating in this music recommendation study! Your feedback helps improve music discovery algorithms.

StepForm.relevance: How well does this model match your music taste?
StepForm.novelty: How unfamiliar are you with the songs that this model suggests?
StepForm.satisfaction: How satisfied are you with the models recommendations?

ThankYouPage.title: You're a Rock Star!
ThankYouPage.thankYouMessage: Thank you for participating in our survey. Your feedback is music to my ears!
ThankYouPage.resultsMessage: You'll be able to see the results in the results tab after April 1st.
ThankYouPage.exploreDataset: Explore the Dataset that I used
